name: The Darkest night
description:
What is this

You are a lost soul inside an old abandon dungeon. you has a soul trapped in armor must try and escape from this dark place. you must jump and dodge different traps and keep your eye out for anything lurking in the darkness. Good Luck. Also when going through the screen shots you will see some concept art I had designed for the game

Released

19-June-2018 

Features

Challenging level's

Easy controls

Addictive levels

Gets harder the each level

Price

Free

Contact

Email:juanwurz@gmail.com

Bio

My names Juan

Im a first year at Media Design school and Im studying how to create games. For one of my Assignments i had to create a game and publish it online. This is the First ever game Ive ever made but wont be the last, Im only starting the path in the gaming industry.
